mapper.select: SELECT reg.*, time_zone, currency_code FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, r.* FROM (SELECT * FROM region WHERE country_name != '국가명' ORDER BY region_no DESC) r) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}) reg LEFT JOIN region_info ON reg.region_no = region_info.region_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO itinerary (itinerary_no, user_no, region_no, itinerary_start_date, itinerary_end_date, itinerary_title) VALUES (itinerary_no_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, #{regionNo}, #{itineraryStartDate}, #{itineraryEndDate}, #{itineraryTitle})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, i.time_zone, i.currency_code FROM region r LEFT JOIN region_info i ON r.region_no = i.region_no WHERE r.region_no = #{regionNo}
